Morphology: Blue or white dots covering body and claws, solid orange antennae, cumbersome looking shell (Jensen, 1995; Cowles, 2005a)
Trophic Role: Detritivore, filter feeder, preys on smaller organisms (Jensen, 1995)
Diet: Small organic matter, detritus, smaller organisms, (Jensen, 1995)
Reprodutive Mode: Sexual reproduction during females' molting phase (Jensen, 1995)

Morphology:
Light circle on antennae, white band on the last joint, blue dot on the end of the leg, covered in hairs 
(Jensen, 2014 ;Meschkat et al., 2014)
Diet: Small organic matter, detritus, smaller organisms (Cowles, 2005b)

Morphology: Red tinged mouthparts, claws, and antennae (Jensen, 1995). Minimal hair on claws and legs (Jensen, 2014).
Sentae on walking legs, white claws, dark green to white colouration (Harbo, 2011)
